sentences.english: All three crimes carry a maximum 10-year prison penalty.

sentences.english: For thou writest bitter things against me, and makest me to possess the iniquities of my youth.

sentences.english: And, when he mentioned his reflection on the facts of his crime, he was actually revealing and rebuking the calumniators .

sentences.english: And the superscription of his accusation was written over, THE KING OF THE JEWS.

sentences.english: There are different comprehensions about article 306 of Criminal Law in practice.

definition: to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
